word: PRAYER FOR SOULS TAKES THE MIND FROM ITS OWN SMALL CONCERNS.—Solicit prayer for the souls for whom you labor; present them before the church as objects for the supplication. It will be just what the church needs, to have their minds called from their little, petty difficulties, to feel a great burden, a personal interest, for a soul that is ready to perish.—(Medical Ministry, 244, 245.)
